trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There were no other sightings in Kokomo on or around June 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI couldnt sleep So I walked over to my window and looked out I immediately noticed This tremendously bright star more brillant then I had ever seen as i continued to watch it , it began changing colors , red, blue, green, white...(by this time I am scared to death and hiding behind the curtains lol) then all of a sudden it darted straight up say about 100 yrds or so then it got bigger and you could see it brighter then ever before with large strobe lights that just kept blinking and then it began to fade out as if it was moving away and was gone... I dont know what it going on in Kokomo but if anyone else could tell me they saw it too please post!
